message: Cloud Exchange **v5.0.1** has reached End of Life on **January 31, 2026**, please upgrade to CE v6.0.1 and refer to [product life cycle](https://docs.netskope.com/en/about-cloud-exchange#block-a4ca387a-bc38-40ea-b4bc-fcb3d2ff37ba) for more details.

Netskope has retired the **Transaction Event Streaming** solution (based on Google Pub/Sub Lite) on **December 31, 2025**, and transitioning to our next-generation log delivery platform: **Netskope Log Streaming**. This is based on Google's plan to deprecate Pub/Sub Lite. CE (from v5.1.2) supports Log Streaming workflow through the following plugins, [AWS LogStreaming Plugin for Log Shipper](https://docs.netskope.com/en/aws-logstreaming-plugin-for-log-shipper) and [Azure LogStreaming Plugin for Log Shipper](https://docs.netskope.com/en/azure-logstreaming-plugin-for-log-shipper). Please refer to [Netskope Product EOL/EOS Announcements - Netskope Knowledge Portal](https://docs.netskope.com/en/netskope-product-eol-announcements) for more details.

We are announcing the general availability of Netskope Cloud Exchange **v6.0.1 patch release** that includes the business-critical security updates described at [Netskope Cloud Exchange Knowledge Portal](https://docs.netskope.com/en/risk-assessment-remediation-and-mitigation-plan-for-netskope-cloud-exchange-deployments). We strongly recommend that customers **deploy, upgrade, or migrate to CE v6.0.1** to take advantage of the latest critical bug fixes and security updates, helping to strengthen the security posture of their digital ecosystem. Please refer to the [release notes](https://docs.netskope.com/en/netskope-cloud-exchange-release-notes-version-6-0-1), [upgrade](https://docs.netskope.com/en/upgrade-cloud-exchange) and [migration](https://docs.netskope.com/en/migrate-cloud-exchange) documentation for more details.
